    HIV.D.DE94First-line ART regimen for adults and adolescentsCurrent ART regimen (first-, second-, or third-line) - First-line ART regimen for adults and adolescents

    HIV.D.DE99Third-line ART regimenCurrent ART regimen (first-, second-, or third-line) - Third-line ART regimen
